addr: Lakewood Center, 5200 Faculty Ave Lakewood, CA 90712
title: Star Trek Wars PREMIERE SCREENING!!! + Steven Spielberg and the Return to Film School DOUBLE FEATURE!!!
desc: Join us for the Premiere Screening of Star Trek Wars! It's completely free, just reserve your ticket above! 11/12/15: We're happy to announce that we will now have a DOUBLE FEATURE with our previous film, Steven Spielberg and the Return to Film School! Don't miss it! 6:00pm - Steven Spielberg and the Return to Film School 6:20pm - Star Trek Wars PREMIERE If you are a contributor, certain rewards will be available for pick-up! Please see the merchandise table after the screening to collect your rewards! (must present photo ID) Live Long, Prosper, and May the Force Be With You! The Star Trek Wars Team
